attributes.action: Ban any attempt to impose External Vehicle Speed Control on Motorcycles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The use of External Vehicle Speed Control (EVSC -Mulhouse Declaration) on any vehicle, especially motorcycles, is a succession of 'accidents' waiting to happen. The idea of power-delivery being tampered with under use is frankly insane, and should be treated accordingly.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ban any attempt to impose External Vehicle Speed Control on Motorcycles."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15373.asp
